topics.body:
"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54e542b063687276d2c60000#post_54e542b063687276d2c60000
[bq="Carcass Strife"]"@Shadow the Hedgehog":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54e542386368722adb0a1400#post_54e542386368722adb0a1400
I need a list, I'ma idiot :)[/bq]

"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54e542b063687276d2c60000#post_54e542b063687276d2c60000
No, ur just a noob in practice :)

1) the first one, and the most famous and well know hat in all the world of TF2. The Gibus.

!http://cloud-4.steampowered.com/ugc/3318333934921252266/18A0E7AE0468DE243CCBAC479657358AAF0296BD/!

Killing and dominating an user with this hat and you get this one! 
^It fits so good with the Pyrovision and the Mercenary Badge^

2) The colorful Pyrovision Goggles.

!http://cloud-2.steampowered.com/ugc/3318333934921263047/0B5E639CFDF243F107C30F6E774B2B3F6BCBE9BC/!

A basic cosmetic. The same as before, kill and dominate a guy with this cosmetic and you get those awesome Goggles.

3) The Full Head of Steam

!http://cloud-4.steampowered.com/ugc/3318333934921862122/882C11F4E109473D094BFB492505D236DAC69A3C/!

You obtain this hat by playing in the Foundry map and getting the Foundry Milestone archivement!

4) Gentle Munitionne of Leisure

!http://cloud-4.steampowered.com/ugc/3318333934921989759/E98567000269208A51598DAFAD43BDDF3B76A200/!

I like this hat because it has a cool smoke effect. You need to get 7 of the 11 archivements in the map Doomsday.

5) Frontline Field Recorder

!http://cloud-2.steampowered.com/ugc/3318333934922179339/7AA569C78498CA68BDA73FDD38E1A824BE1E93DE/!

This requieres some little effort. You need to upload a tf2 related video in Youtube, and you need 1000 views so you gain an archivement, and then you gain this hat.

6) The Skull Island Topper

!http://cloud-4.steampowered.com/ugc/3318333934922239069/BFB16D6571C81F162E96A9949060483298E7478B/!

Very simple... Kill Merasmus, and escape from his island.

7) Proffessor Speks

!http://cloud-4.steampowered.com/ugc/3318333934922407517/A61A25194FC652B7780D5158D39B881DD6320ABB/!

This requires that someone ELSE spends money by becoming a Premium Player, and crediting you as the most helpful person for learning TF2. This item tracks how many "Users you helped", people who credit you when they go premium.

8) The Bombonicon

!http://cloud-2.steampowered.com/ugc/3318333934921354155/F26176D6B12E8F408657607707B5C53A3E3DC8C6/!

Another one that is very simple to get, kill Monoculous and survive his island.

9) Taunt: The Director's Vision

!http://cloud-2.steampowered.com/ugc/3318333934922669205/1E14131BF8D3AA3F62FA02CE915962F0F7935BDA/!

The only free taunt that I know. You must view a saved Replay you have made, and use EVERY tool available while watching it .

10) Alien Swarm Parasite

!http://cloud-4.steampowered.com/ugc/3318333934921340898/2D2262233F55FA42A90A296EB6B44B265F8CDD39/!

Easy. 
just play and complete 1 mission. Any map, difficulty, co-op or solo, just win it, and you earn this hat.

The other "free" hats are obtained by playing other Steam games. Other hats are obtained in the Halloween days.
